metadata.title: CVE-2020-24345 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** JerryScript through 2.3.0 allows stack consumption viafunction a(){new new Proxy(a,{})}JSON.parse("[]",a). NOTE: the vendorstates that the problem is the lack of the --stack-limit option.

criterions.comment: iotjs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
